definition: zero/nought/zero sign/fractional/fragmentary/odd (of numbers)/(placed between two numbers to indicate a smaller quantity followed by a larger one)/fraction/(in mathematics) remainder (after division)/extra/to wither and fall/to wither

sentences.english: That includes everything from vitamins and supplements to healthy snacks.
sentences.chinese: 这包括来自于维生素的全部和健康零食的补充。

sentences.english: Do not drink more than two battles of drink. Drink more water and eat less snacks.
sentences.chinese: 毎日不喝超过二罐饮料，多喝水，少吃零食。

sentences.english: Researchers advise reallocating snack foods into small plastic bags.
sentences.chinese: 研究人员建议将零食用小塑料袋分开包装。

sentences.english: I used to spend all my pocket money on clothes and snacks.
sentences.chinese: 我过去常把我所有的零花钱花在衣服和零食上。

sentences.english: But you don't plan to snack, so you overeat.
sentences.chinese: 但是你并没把吃零食列入计划，所以你会吃得过量。

sentences.english: Choose healthier snacks at work. Learn to think out of the donut box.
sentences.chinese: 工作时选择健康点的零食，别老是盯着甜面圈盒子。

sentences.english: Get rid of your snacks and in-between-meals pleasures.
sentences.chinese: 戒掉零食和每顿饭之间的朵颐之欢。

sentences.english: The snack aisles in supermarkets are very big and have lots of choices.
sentences.chinese: 超市里放零食的货架很大，意味着可选择的种类很多。

sentences.english: Yvonne nibbled on some carrot sticks as a snack.
sentences.chinese: 伊冯娜一点点地啃着胡萝卜条，当作是在吃零食。

sentences.english: Replace junky snacks with them and you won't gain an ounce.
sentences.chinese: 用垃圾零食取代坚果你将不能取得一点益处。

sentences.english: Little eat sweetmeat and glue sex of very strong food, don't eat between meals.
sentences.chinese: 少吃甜食及粘性很强的食物，不吃零食。

sentences.english: Don't eat snacks in your free time.
sentences.chinese: 闲下来的时候不要吃零食。

sentences.english: Bring your own snacks and pack a brown-bag lunch to reduce costs even more.
sentences.chinese: 带自己的零食，自带午餐，来更多地减少成本。

sentences.english: Have you ever bought snacks or drinks in the Convenience Store of Orchid Canteen?
sentences.chinese: 您曾到过兰苑食堂的便利店买零食或者饮料吗？

sentences.english: While you are there, buy healthy snacks for your employees.
sentences.chinese: 当你在那里购物时，给你的员工买些健康的零食。

definition: soft candy (gummi candy, gumdrop, jellybean etc)
spicy sticks, a snack food similar to beef jerky but made with flour or dried beancurd instead of meat
